title: Scoring Template
description: JSON schema for patent scoring templates with inheritance support

$schema.description: Reference to this schema for validation

description.description: Description of what this template is for

superSectorName.description: Name of super-sector (required for super_sector level)

sectorName.description: Name of sector (required for sector level)

subSectorId.description: ID of sub-sector (required for sub_sector level)

inheritsFrom.description: ID of parent template to inherit questions from

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default template for its level

version.description: Version number for tracking template changes

scoringGuidance.description: General scoring instructions inherited and merged from parent templates. Applied to all questions.

contextDescription.description: Context about this technology area to help LLM understand the domain. Inherited and concatenated.

questions.description: Scoring questions specific to this template (merged with inherited)

question.description: The prompt question for LLM scoring

weight.description: Weight of this question in composite score (0-1)

requiresReasoning.description: Whether LLM must provide reasoning for the score

reasoningPrompt.description: Optional prompt to guide reasoning generation
